about_the_game:
In this parody of popular streamers! Play as your favorite content creators like Mokipane, Asmondsilver and CQX. Form a cult! Squeeze your pay piggies, start drama, appease chat and rake in the dough. Earn bitties by performing actions for chat, collect the fallen bits using various stream upgrades that multiply their values. Use the money earned to buy upgrades for stream, random temporary upgrades that boosts every drop of money from your following, Buy different streamers and play minigames!

What can you expect from this game:

  • Over 5 iconic parodies of popular streamers and celebrities, each with their own sound clips and actions.

  • Multiple upgrades that help boost income.

  • Achievements.

  • Skill Tree

  • Prestige

  • Radio feature with copyright free Lo-Fi beats.

content_descriptors.notes: In game characters are parodies of popular streamers. Some streamers have said some controversial things or just raunchy dialogue. Characters in the game are repeating some of the things said by these streamers. Examples are the N-word or racists behavior as well as some political views popular or not. This game is 100% parody aimed to make light or fun of these events.

name: Idle Streaming Bonanza

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) , Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
